places_to_visit.name: Oia Village
places_to_visit.description: Oia is famous for its stunning sunsets and traditional white-washed buildings with blue domes. The village offers beautiful views of the caldera and is perfect for a romantic evening.

places_to_visit.name: Fira
places_to_visit.description: Fira is the island’s bustling capital. Visitors can explore its shops, cafes, and museums, and enjoy panoramic views of the caldera from various viewpoints.

places_to_visit.name: Akrotiri Archaeological Site
places_to_visit.description: Akrotiri is an ancient Minoan city preserved under volcanic ash. The site offers a glimpse into a sophisticated prehistoric civilization with well-preserved frescoes and artifacts.

places_to_visit.name: Perissa Beach
places_to_visit.description: Perissa Beach is known for its black volcanic sand and clear waters. It's a great spot for sunbathing, swimming, and enjoying beachside cafes and bars.

places_to_visit.name: Red Beach
places_to_visit.description: Red Beach is famous for its striking red cliffs and sand. It’s a unique spot for swimming and snorkeling, surrounded by dramatic volcanic landscapes.
